name: cryptoitem-metadata-server
description: Quickly deploy a server for hosting cryptoitem metadata (ex. ERC-721 tokenURIs)

scripts.deploy: node scripts/replace_url $npm_package_config_server_url && git heroku push master
scripts.deploy-windows: node scripts/replace_url %npm_package_config_server_url% && git push heroku master

author: Paul Gadi
